de.embl.rieslab.emu.ui.swinglisteners

Class SwingUIListeners

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.embl.rieslab.emu.ui.swinglisteners.SwingUIListeners

  • public class SwingUIListeners
extends java.lang.Object
    This class holds static standard methods to link Swing components with UIProperties or actions. The methods trigger a UIProperty change or an action when the user interacts with the JComponents.
    Author:
    Joran Deschamps

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SwingUIListeners() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void addActionListenerOnDoubleValue(ConfigurablePanel cp, java.lang.String propertyKey, javax.swing.JTextField txtf)
      Adds a Swing action listener to a JTextField value, causing the UIProperty propertyKey from cp to be updated with the JTextField (double) value.
      static void addActionListenerOnDoubleValue(ConfigurablePanel cp, java.lang.String propertyKey, javax.swing.JTextField txtf, double min, double max)
      Adds a Swing action listener to a JTextField value, causing the UIProperty propertyKey from cp to be updated with the JTextField (double) value within an allowed range defined by min and max.
      static void addActionListenerOnIntegerValue(ConfigurablePanel cp, java.lang.String propertyKey, javax.swing.JSlider sld)
      Adds a Swing action listener to a JSlider, causing the UIProperty propertyKey from cp to be updated with the JSlider (integer) value.
      static void addActionListenerOnIntegerValue(ConfigurablePanel cp, java.lang.String propertyKey, javax.swing.JSlider sld, javax.swing.JLabel lbl)
      Adds a Swing action listener to a JSlider, causing the UIProperty propertyKey from cp and the JLabel lbl to be updated with the JSlider (integer) value.
      static void addActionListenerOnIntegerValue(ConfigurablePanel cp, java.lang.String propertyKey, javax.swing.JSlider sld, javax.swing.JLabel lbl, java.lang.String prefix, java.lang.String suffix)
      Adds a Swing action listener to a JSlider, causing the UIProperty propertyKey from cp and the JLabel lbl to be updated with the JSlider (integer) value.
      static void addActionListenerOnIntegerValue(ConfigurablePanel cp, java.lang.String propertyKey, javax.swing.JSlider sld, javax.swing.JTextField txtf)
      Adds a Swing action listener to a JSlider, causing the UIProperty propertyKey from cp and the JTextField txtf to be updated with the JSlider (integer) value.
      static void addActionListenerOnIntegerValue(ConfigurablePanel cp, java.lang.String propertyKey, javax.swing.JTextField txtf)
      Adds a Swing action listener to a JTextField value, causing the UIProperty propertyKey from cp to be updated with the JTextField (integer) value.
      static void addActionListenerOnIntegerValue(ConfigurablePanel cp, java.lang.String propertyKey, javax.swing.JTextField txtf, int min, int max)
      Adds a Swing action listener to a JTextField value, causing the UIProperty propertyKey from cp to be updated with the JTextField (integer) value within an allowed range defined by min and max.
      static void addActionListenerOnIntegerValue(ConfigurablePanel cp, java.lang.String propertyKey, javax.swing.JTextField txtf, javax.swing.JSlider sld)
      Adds a Swing action listener to a JTextField, causing the UIProperty propertyKey from cp and the JSlider sld to be updated with the JTextField (integer) value.
      static void addActionListenerOnSelectedIndex(ConfigurablePanel cp, java.lang.String propertyKey, javax.swing.ButtonGroup group)
      Adds a Swing action listener to a ButtonGroup, causing the UIProperty propertyKey from cp to be updated with the ButtonGroup currently selected button index.
      static void addActionListenerOnSelectedIndex(ConfigurablePanel cp, java.lang.String propertyKey, javax.swing.ButtonGroup group, java.lang.String[] values)
      Adds a Swing action listener to a ButtonGroup, causing the UIProperty propertyKey from cp to be updated with the entry of values whose index equals the ButtonGroup currently selected button index.
      static void addActionListenerOnSelectedIndex(ConfigurablePanel cp, java.lang.String propertyKey, javax.swing.JComboBox<?> cbx)
      Adds a Swing action listener to a JComboBox, causing the UIProperty propertyKey from cp to be updated with the JCombobox currently selected index.
      static void addActionListenerOnSelectedIndex(ConfigurablePanel cp, java.lang.String propertyKey, javax.swing.JComboBox<?> cbx, java.lang.String[] values)
      Adds a Swing action listener to a JCombobox, causing the UIProperty propertyKey from cp to be updated with the entry of values whose index equals the JCombobox currently selected index.
      static void addActionListenerOnStringValue(ConfigurablePanel cp, java.lang.String propertyKey, javax.swing.JComboBox<java.lang.String> cbx)
      Adds a Swing action listener to a JComboBox, causing the UIProperty propertyKey from cp to be updated with the JCombobox current value.
      static void addActionListenerOnStringValue(ConfigurablePanel cp, java.lang.String propertyKey, javax.swing.JTextField txtf)
      Adds a Swing action listener to a JTextField value, causing the UIProperty propertyKey from cp to be updated with the JTextField value upon pressing the enter key.
      static void addActionListenerToBooleanAction(Action<java.lang.Boolean> action, javax.swing.JToggleButton tglb)
      Adds a Swing action listener to a JToggleButton causing the (boolean) Action to be triggered upon tglb change.
      static void addActionListenerToDoubleAction(Action<java.lang.Double> action, javax.swing.JTextField txtf)
      Adds a Swing action listener to a JTextField with an input of type Double, triggering an Action (lambda expression) when the enter key is pressed.
      static void addActionListenerToDoubleAction(Action<java.lang.Double> action, javax.swing.JTextField txtf, double min, double max)
      Adds a Swing action listener to a JTextField with an input of type Double between min and max, triggering an Action (lambda expression) when the enter key is pressed.
      static void addActionListenerToIntegerAction(Action<java.lang.Integer> action, javax.swing.JSlider sldr)
      Adds a Swing mouse listener to a JSlider causing the (Integer) Action to be triggered upon value change.
      static void addActionListenerToIntegerAction(Action<java.lang.Integer> action, javax.swing.JTextField txtf)
      Adds a Swing action listener to a JTextField with an input of type Integer, triggering an Action (lambda expression) when the enter key is pressed.
      static void addActionListenerToSingleState(ConfigurablePanel cp, java.lang.String propertyKey, javax.swing.AbstractButton btn)
      Adds a Swing action listener to an AbstractButton causing the SingleStateUIProperty to be set to its single-state upon pressing the button.
      static void addActionListenerToStringAction(Action<java.lang.String> action, javax.swing.JTextField txtf)
      Adds a Swing action listener to a JTextField, triggering an Action (lambda expression) when the enter key is pressed.
      static void addActionListenerToTwoState(ConfigurablePanel cp, java.lang.String propertyKey, javax.swing.JToggleButton tglb)
      Adds a Swing action listener to a JToggleButton causing the TwoStateUIProperty propertyKey from cp to be switched to its on or off state depending on tglb state.
      static void addActionListenerToUnparametrizedAction(UnparametrizedAction action, javax.swing.AbstractButton btn)
      Adds a Swing action listener to an AbstractButton causing the UnparametrizedAction to be triggered upon clicking on the button.
      static void addChangeListenerOnNumericalValue(ConfigurablePanel cp, java.lang.String propertyKey, javax.swing.JSpinner spnr)
      Adds a Swing change listener to a JSpinner, causing the UIProperty propertyKey to be updated upon spnr state change.

      • addActionListenerOnStringValue

        public static void addActionListenerOnStringValue(ConfigurablePanel cp,
                                                  java.lang.String propertyKey,
                                                  javax.swing.JComboBox<java.lang.String> cbx)
        Adds a Swing action listener to a JComboBox, causing the UIProperty propertyKey from cp to be updated with the JCombobox current value.
        Parameters:
        cp - ConfigurablePanel that owns the property.
        propertyKey - UIProperty to modify when the JComboBox changes.
        cbx - JCombobox holding the different UIproperty states.

      • addActionListenerOnStringValue

        public static void addActionListenerOnStringValue(ConfigurablePanel cp,
                                                  java.lang.String propertyKey,
                                                  javax.swing.JTextField txtf)
        Adds a Swing action listener to a JTextField value, causing the UIProperty propertyKey from cp to be updated with the JTextField value upon pressing the enter key.
        Parameters:
        cp - ConfigurablePanel that owns the property.
        propertyKey - UIProperty to modify when the JTextField changes.
        txtf - JTextField the user interacts with.

        cp - ConfigurablePanel that owns the property.
        propertyKey - UIProperty to modify when the ButtonGroup selected button changes.
        group - ButtonGroup containing the different buttons.

      • addActionListenerOnSelectedIndex

        public static void addActionListenerOnSelectedIndex(ConfigurablePanel cp,
                                                    java.lang.String propertyKey,
                                                    javax.swing.ButtonGroup group,
                                                    java.lang.String[] values)
        Adds a Swing action listener to a ButtonGroup, causing the UIProperty propertyKey from cp to be updated with the entry of values whose index equals the ButtonGroup currently selected button index.
        Parameters:
        cp - ConfigurablePanel that owns the property.
        propertyKey - UIProperty to modify when the ButtonGroup selected button changes.
        group - ButtonGroup containing the different buttons.
        values - String array containing the values to set the UIProperty to.

      • addActionListenerOnIntegerValue

        public static void addActionListenerOnIntegerValue(ConfigurablePanel cp,
                                                   java.lang.String propertyKey,
                                                   javax.swing.JTextField txtf,
                                                   int min,
                                                   int max)
        Adds a Swing action listener to a JTextField value, causing the UIProperty propertyKey from cp to be updated with the JTextField (integer) value within an allowed range defined by min and max. Non-integer values are ignored.
        Parameters:
        cp - ConfigurablePanel that owns the UIProperty propertyKey
        propertyKey - Label of the UIProperty to update.
        txtf - JTextField.
        min - Minimum accepted value.
        max - Maximum accepted value.

      • addActionListenerOnDoubleValue

        public static void addActionListenerOnDoubleValue(ConfigurablePanel cp,
                                                  java.lang.String propertyKey,
                                                  javax.swing.JTextField txtf,
                                                  double min,
                                                  double max)
        Adds a Swing action listener to a JTextField value, causing the UIProperty propertyKey from cp to be updated with the JTextField (double) value within an allowed range defined by min and max. Non-double values are ignored.
        Parameters:
        cp - ConfigurablePanel that owns the UIProperty propertyKey
        propertyKey - Label of the UIProperty to update.
        txtf - JTextField.
        min - Minimum accepted value.
        max - Maximum accepted value.

      • addActionListenerToDoubleAction

        public static void addActionListenerToDoubleAction(Action<java.lang.Double> action,
                                                   javax.swing.JTextField txtf)
        Adds a Swing action listener to a JTextField with an input of type Double, triggering an Action (lambda expression) when the enter key is pressed. Non-double expressions will be ignored.
        Parameters:
        action - Action taking a Double parameter.
        txtf - JTextField triggering the Action.

      • addActionListenerToDoubleAction

        public static void addActionListenerToDoubleAction(Action<java.lang.Double> action,
                                                   javax.swing.JTextField txtf,
                                                   double min,
                                                   double max)
        Adds a Swing action listener to a JTextField with an input of type Double between min and max, triggering an Action (lambda expression) when the enter key is pressed. Non-double expressions will be ignored.
        Parameters:
        action - Action taking a Double parameter.
        txtf - JTextField triggering the Action.
        min - Minimum value of the Double input.
        max - Maximum value of the Double input.

        Parameters:
        action - Action taking a String parameter.
        txtf - JTextField triggering the Action.

        Parameters:
        action - Action taking an Integer parameter.
        txtf - JTextField triggering the Action.

      • addActionListenerOnIntegerValue

        public static void addActionListenerOnIntegerValue(ConfigurablePanel cp,
                                                   java.lang.String propertyKey,
                                                   javax.swing.JTextField txtf,
                                                   javax.swing.JSlider sld)
        Adds a Swing action listener to a JTextField, causing the UIProperty propertyKey from cp and the JSlider sld to be updated with the JTextField (integer) value. Non-integer values will be ignored.
        Parameters:
        cp - ConfigurablePanel that owns the UIProperty propertyKey
        propertyKey - Label of the UIProperty to update.
        txtf - JTextField triggering the update when the enter key is pressed.
        sld - JSlider updated alongside the UIProperty.

        Parameters:
        cp - ConfigurablePanel that owns the UIProperty propertyKey
        propertyKey - Label of the UIProperty to update.
        sld - JSlider triggering the update.

      • addActionListenerOnIntegerValue

        public static void addActionListenerOnIntegerValue(ConfigurablePanel cp,
                                                   java.lang.String propertyKey,
                                                   javax.swing.JSlider sld,
                                                   javax.swing.JLabel lbl)
        Adds a Swing action listener to a JSlider, causing the UIProperty propertyKey from cp and the JLabel lbl to be updated with the JSlider (integer) value.
        Parameters:
        cp - ConfigurablePanel that owns the UIProperty propertyKey
        propertyKey - Label of the UIProperty to update.
        sld - JSlider triggering the update.
        lbl - JLabel updated alongside the UIProperty.

      • addActionListenerOnIntegerValue

        public static void addActionListenerOnIntegerValue(ConfigurablePanel cp,
                                                   java.lang.String propertyKey,
                                                   javax.swing.JSlider sld,
                                                   javax.swing.JLabel lbl,
                                                   java.lang.String prefix,
                                                   java.lang.String suffix)
        Adds a Swing action listener to a JSlider, causing the UIProperty propertyKey from cp and the JLabel lbl to be updated with the JSlider (integer) value.
        Parameters:
        cp - ConfigurablePanel that owns the UIProperty propertyKey
        propertyKey - Label of the UIProperty to update.
        sld - JSlider triggering the update.
        lbl - JLabel updated alongside the UIProperty.
        prefix - Prefix added in the JLabel text before the JSlider value.
        suffix - Suffix added in the JLabel text after the JSlider value.

      • addActionListenerToTwoState

        public static void addActionListenerToTwoState(ConfigurablePanel cp,
                                               java.lang.String propertyKey,
                                               javax.swing.JToggleButton tglb)
                                        throws IncorrectUIPropertyTypeException
        Adds a Swing action listener to a JToggleButton causing the TwoStateUIProperty propertyKey from cp to be switched to its on or off state depending on tglb state.
        Parameters:
        cp - ConfigurablePanel that owns the TwoStateUIProperty propertyKey.
        propertyKey - Label of the TwoStateUIProperty.
        tglb - JToggleButton triggering the TwoStateUIProperty change.
        Throws:
        IncorrectUIPropertyTypeException - Exception thrown if propertyKey does not correspond to a TwoStateUIProperty.

      • addActionListenerToBooleanAction

        public static void addActionListenerToBooleanAction(Action<java.lang.Boolean> action,
                                                    javax.swing.JToggleButton tglb)
        Adds a Swing action listener to a JToggleButton causing the (boolean) Action to be triggered upon tglb change.
        Parameters:
        action - Action triggered by a change in tglb state.
        tglb - JToggleButton triggering the Action.

      • addActionListenerToIntegerAction

        public static void addActionListenerToIntegerAction(Action<java.lang.Integer> action,
                                                    javax.swing.JSlider sldr)
        Adds a Swing mouse listener to a JSlider causing the (Integer) Action to be triggered upon value change.
        Parameters:
        action - Action triggered by a change of sldr.
        sldr - Jslider triggering the Action.

      • addActionListenerToUnparametrizedAction

        public static void addActionListenerToUnparametrizedAction(UnparametrizedAction action,
                                                           javax.swing.AbstractButton btn)
        Adds a Swing action listener to an AbstractButton causing the UnparametrizedAction to be triggered upon clicking on the button.
        Parameters:
        action - Action triggered by btn being pressed.
        btn - Button triggering the action.

      • addActionListenerToSingleState

        public static void addActionListenerToSingleState(ConfigurablePanel cp,
                                                  java.lang.String propertyKey,
                                                  javax.swing.AbstractButton btn)
                                           throws IncorrectUIPropertyTypeException
        Adds a Swing action listener to an AbstractButton causing the SingleStateUIProperty to be set to its single-state upon pressing the button.
        Parameters:
        cp - ConfigurablePanel that owns the SingleStateUIProperty propertyKey.
        propertyKey - Label of the SingleStateUIProperty.
        btn - AbstractButton triggering the call.
        Throws:
        IncorrectUIPropertyTypeException - Thrown if propertyKey does not correspond to a SingleStateUIProperty.

      • addChangeListenerOnNumericalValue

        public static void addChangeListenerOnNumericalValue(ConfigurablePanel cp,
                                                     java.lang.String propertyKey,
                                                     javax.swing.JSpinner spnr)
        Adds a Swing change listener to a JSpinner, causing the UIProperty propertyKey to be updated upon spnr state change.
        Parameters:
        cp - ConfigurablePanel that owns the UIProperty propertyKey.
        propertyKey - Label of the UIProperty.
        spnr - JSpinner with SpinnerNumberModel value triggering the UIProperty change.
